articles.content: On the other hand, Nehal Gupta won the SL3 event beating Mathieu Thomas of France 21-16 21-14. "I am really happy with the result, I have been training hard. I have had a good year and I hope that I … [+137 chars]

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Yuvraj Singh Rates Rohit Sharma's Captaincy, His Response Is Pure Gold - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Among all the responses, one caught everyone's eyes. It was from Rohit's former teammate and Indian cricket great Yuvraj Singh. He simple wrote 10 on 10 in the comment.
articles.content: Rohit Sharma took over as India's captain across all formats earlier this year but he has been leading the white-ball teams on and off for a few years, standing in for former captain Virat Kohli from… [+1515 chars]

articles.title: 'It'll happen if you don't respect the game': Jadeja slams IND's batting vs BAN - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India's batting was immensely criticised and Jadeja joined the bandwagon in questioning the approach of the Indian side, slamming them for not respecting the sport. | Cricket
articles.content: A sensational tenth-wicket partnership between Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Mustafizur Rahman helped Bangladesh recover from the middle-order collapse to secure a memorable one-wicket win in Mirpur. The In… [+2015 chars]

articles.author: Dan Marsh
articles.title: Belgium stars wanted Roberto Martinez out pre-World Cup after 'gutless' Eden Hazard call - The Mirror
articles.description: Ex-Belgium boss Roberto Martinez's decision to continue picking Eden Hazard was unpopular with some members of the squad, who were dumped out of the World Cup at the Group phase last week
articles.content:
The majority of the Belgium squad wanted boss Roberto Martinez out before the World Cup - partly because of his 'gutless' decision to persist with Eden Hazard, it has emerged. 
 An emotional Martine… [+2666 chars]
